privateEncounter.description: <u>A Hard-earned Meal</u> \qGladion and his wife Limril have invited you to join them for a family meal, but Gladion's brother Fuirion has not yet arrived.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Shadow In Morthond
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Shadow In Morthond</u> \qA great beast flew out of the mountains, and now I fear a creature of much evil stalks the Blackroot Vale...\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Ruthless Dead
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Ruthless Dead</u> \qThe Dimholt road leads to the Dark Door and the paths beneath the Haunted Mountain, where the Dead walk. Few dare to go that way.\q

privateEncounter.name: Interlude: Those Who Are Dead
privateEncounter.description: <u>Those Who Are Dead</u> \qNo one living could hope to know what moves the Dead Men of Dunharrow. Only one of their kind could know what it means to remain forever cursed...\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: A Dark Pact
privateEncounter.description: <u>A Dark Pact</u> \qAfter investigating strange occurrences throughout the vale, you have tracked an invader from Tarlang's Crown to the Hill of Erech. While their identity remains unknown, they intend to form a pact with the Ruthless Dead - a union that could spell doom for Gondor.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Cursed Vale
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Cursed Vale</u> \qDisheartened by news of the Oath-breakers' influence on the vale and the growing threat in Tarlang's Crown, Malthellam has called you and Lady Rosfin to counsel.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: A Life Hangs on a Thread
privateEncounter.description: <u>A Life Hangs on a Thread</u> \qThe Corsairs camped in Lamedon have wounded Fuirion badly, and his life hangs on a thread while they look on in mirth.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Negotiations
privateEncounter.description: <u>Negotiations</u> \qYou have earned the respect of the formidable Captain Jajax, and he will now negotiate with you regarding the fate of Lothgobel.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: First of the Heirs
privateEncounter.description: <u>First of the Heirs</u> \qAfter rallying the Ruthless Dead in Blackroot Vale, Azruthor returned to Tarlang's Crown. There, he now leads a great army that awaits his command to raze the lands of Anfalas to the west.\q

privateEncounter.name: Interlude: Passage of the Marshes
privateEncounter.description: <u>Passage of the Marshes</u> \qThe fetid swamplands stretch in all directions. Did Frodo come this way...?\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Missing in the Marshes
privateEncounter.description: <u>Missing in the Marshes</u> \qArtamir has disappeared from his camp. Has he run afoul of some evil in the Dead Marshes...?\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Balakhôr the Scourge
privateEncounter.description: <u>Balakhôr the Scourge</u> \qBalakhôr has asked that I treat with him on the deck of his flagship, but can he be trusted?\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Even In Darkness
privateEncounter.description: <u>Even In Darkness</u> \qWe must storm the Night-jewel and put an end to Balakhôr and the threat of Umbar!\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Speech of Animals
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Speech of Animals</u> \qOoooh, I do not like this creepy forest, but I will show you where I saw that great beast of a bear!\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Hatred of Bear and Man
privateEncounter.description: <u>Hatred of Bear and Man</u> \qOfolmóth has brought this fate upon himself, but it does not make our duty of bringing him to justice any easier.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Skin-changer's Heritage
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Skin-changer's Heritage</u> \qIn the vales of the Anduin, the children and grandchildren of Beorn live a rustic and peaceful life. Soon, they too will need to face the shadow that threatens all of Middle-earth....\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Sister of the Gilrain
privateEncounter.description: <u>Sister of the Gilrain</u> \qThe mysterious Roamingstar, Sister of the Gilrain, hopes to atone for her past mistakes by using her influence over the rivers of Gondor to banish the Ruthless Dead from her lands forever.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Blood for Blood
privateEncounter.description: <u>Blood for Blood</u> \qStriving to avenge Dolgimil, the Corsair and Haradrim invaders of Dor-en-Ernil make ready to siege Linhir once more and slay its people as retribution.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: A Just Burial
privateEncounter.description: <u>A Just Burial</u> \qBrothers Erchar and Herion return to the site of a battle that drove them apart. You accompany them to pay respects before the returning journey to Linhir.\q

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Retaking Pelargir - Fellowship
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: <u>Retaking Pelargir</u> \qThe Corsair fleet has tarried on Gondor's coast, pillaging on their way. Now Aragorn's host has caught up with them at the port city of Pelargir. Join Elladan and Elrohir in an advance party to clear the path for Aragorn's assault on the unsuspecting Corsair force.\q

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Retaking Pelargir - Solo
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: <u>Retaking Pelargir</u> \qThe Corsair fleet has tarried on Gondor's coast, pillaging on their way. Now Aragorn's host has caught up with them at the port city of Pelargir. Join Elladan and Elrohir in an advance party to clear the path for Aragorn's assault on the unsuspecting Corsair force.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Faltharan's Confrontation
privateEncounter.description: <u>Instance: Faltharan's Confrontation</u> \qYou have tracked down where the traitor Lorvegil is located, and are ready to bring him to justice.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Farewell to Pelargir
privateEncounter.description: <u>Farewell to Pelargir</u> \qAfter freeing many citizens of Pelargir from the grasp of Corsair holdouts, it is now time for them to locate a safer refuge.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Under the White Mountain
privateEncounter.description: <u>Under the White Mountain</u> \qArvaethor accompanies you into a cavern underneath the White Mountains in an attempt to push back the orkish forces from entering the Vale.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: A Ruthless End
privateEncounter.description: <u>A Ruthless End</u> \qArvaethor, a man with great passion for his home, would risk his life for the Vale. You have requested to join him on this dangerous errand into the hall of Nimrond.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: A Commanding Knock
privateEncounter.description: <u>A Commanding Knock</u> \qLoud noises from outside the Crossing-hall require Borhador to seek your aid and quell his fear of an orkish invasion.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Legacy of Strife
privateEncounter.description: <u>Legacy of Strife</u> \qAs the Heirs of Castamir expand their influence in Lebennin, the people of Ost Anglebed find their loyalties called in question as the old wounds of the Kin-strife are rent anew.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Darkness Over Lebennin
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Darkness Over Lebennin</u> \qNow fearing for the fate of the Corsairs, Daxamat, the brother of Jajax, recalls his dread in Dor-en-Ernil when he observed the meeting of the Scourge and a terrible man.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Sons of the Usurper
privateEncounter.description: <u>Sons of the Usurper</u> \qAfter learning of Azgarzôr's whereabouts in Lebennin, Erchar and Herion rally at your side to avenge Garvir as Jajax prepares to deal a devastating blow to the Heirs of Castamir before they can lead Umbar to ruin.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Sink or Swim
privateEncounter.description: <u>Sink or Swim</u> \qBingo has decided to master one final skill for his journey: he will learn to swim!\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: A Restful Night
privateEncounter.description: <u>A Restful Night</u> \qThe journey has been a tiring one already, and Bingo is ready to camp for the night in the wild of the Trollshaws...\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: A Dangerous Detour
privateEncounter.description: <u>A Dangerous Detour</u> \qBingo's quest to have an adventure full of excitement and daring has now brought him up the Bitter Stair, to the dangerous stronghold of Helegrod...\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Dour Faces
privateEncounter.description: <u>Dour Faces</u> \qYou and Spalvi have climbed high into the Redhorn Pass, looking for cave entrances that might bring you closer to finding Bingo....\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Defence of Arnach
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Defence of Arnach</u> Haradrim invaders encircle Arnach, preparing to attack. Can Baranor and his two trusted captains muster their guards, green and untested by war, to hold strong against the brutal onslaught of the foe?

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Madness of Vanyalos
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Madness of Vanyalos</u> After days secluded in her chambers, Lady Vanyalos has left them in a troubled state, seemingly heedless of her path. Down from her hill, down out of Imloth Melui, down to the high banks of the River Anduin where fair flowers nod in the breeze and danger lurks all around.

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Sunken Labyrinth
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: <u>Sunken Labyrinth</u> \qYour search for Faramir leads you to the subterranean tunnels under Osgiliath, where he may have fled to escape an enraged Fell Beast. Shed light on the Ranger's disappearance by delving into the darkness.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Sons of Blackroot
privateEncounter.description: <u>Sons of Blackroot</u> \qMy brother and I have sworn a solemn vow to bring down the mighty Mûmakil that have come to Gondor!\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Sworn to Secrecy
privateEncounter.description: <u>Sworn to Secrecy</u> \qSent by Aragorn himself, Lord Angbor the Fearless has come to Tumladen bearing news of the victory at Pelargir for Lady Terenis as well as tidings that might assuage her fears of her brother's fate.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Rage of the Erui
privateEncounter.description: <u>Rage of the Erui</u> \qMaddened by the encroaching Haradrim, the Lone Lady has lashed out, raising the long-emptied armours of Men who fought in the Kin-strife to drown those who taint the waters of the Erui. Fearful of her anger growing beyond control, the Sisters of Lebennin have united to calm their Sister and bring peace to Lebennin once more.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Gothmog Appears
privateEncounter.description: <u>Gothmog Appears</u> \qOur enemies have brought a great ram to the city. We must damage or destroy it!\q

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: The Dome of Stars
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: <u>The Dome of Stars</u> \qOn the eve of Sauron's assault against Minas Tirith, ships of Umbar sail up-river to the White City. Meanwhile, atop the Dome of Stars, the Black Blade of Lebennin casts a dark shadow over Osgiliath and the host of Minas Morgul below. If his spirit cannot be banished to Mordor before uncovering Aragorn's gambit, it could spell doom for all of Middle-earth.\q

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: The Ruined City
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: <u>The Ruined City</u> \qThrough ruined Osgiliath, you pursue a mysterious figure arrayed in Faramir's tattered cloak. When at last you catch up, will you find Faramir beneath the hood? Will you know the face for friend or foe? You must hope, at least, that you will learn something of Faramir's final fate.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Enter the Easterlings
privateEncounter.description: <u>Enter the Easterlings</u> \qThe Rohirrim outpost of Stangard is endangered by a small party of Easterling raiders. Can the outpost be defended?\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: A Chapter About Elves
privateEncounter.description: <u>A Chapter About Elves</u> \qBingo is excited to take a pleasant stroll in the sunlight, leaving the dark passages of Moria behind him...\q

privateEncounter.name: Raid: The Roving Threats of Central Gondor
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Roving Threats of Central Gondor</u> \qYou gather to defeat the Hardened enemies of Central Gondor who have banded together to stand off against those who oppose them.\q

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Hammer of the Underworld - Solo
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: <u>Hammer of the Underworld</u> \qThe defenders of Gondor struggle to hold the line as Grond, the great ram of the Enemy, crawls towards the gates of Minas Tirith. Grond must be destroyed before it can serve its vile purpose!\q

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Hammer of the Underworld - Fellowship
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: <u>Hammer of the Underworld</u> \qThe defenders of Gondor struggle to hold the line as Grond, the great ram of the Enemy, crawls towards the gates of Minas Tirith. Grond must be destroyed before it can serve its vile purpose!\q

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: The Defence of Minas Tirith - Solo
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: <u>The Defence of Minas Tirith</u> \qThe War for Gondor begins as Sauron's armies march for Minas Tirith. Can the Men of Gondor master their fear before the Enemy claims the White City?\q

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: The Defence of Minas Tirith - Small Fellowship
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: <u>The Defence of Minas Tirith</u> \qThe War for Gondor begins as Sauron's armies march for Minas Tirith. Can the Men of Gondor master their fear before the Enemy claims the White City?\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Tale of Tolwin
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Tale of Tolwin</u> \qThe slain body of a Sûhalar Easterling has led you to a brave warrior holding out in Talath Anor that may be in need of your aid.\q

privateEncounter.name: Public Instance: The Harlond
privateEncounter.description: Public Instance: The Harlond

privateEncounter.name: Public Instance: The Northern Rammas
privateEncounter.description: Public Instance: The Northern Rammas

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The First Blade
privateEncounter.description: <u>The First Blade</u> \qYou stand at the steps of Cair Andros where the fearsome Sûhalar, Korpûrta, must face the consequences of his actions for the slaughter of Gilgír and his sons.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Treasure Lost, Treasure Found
privateEncounter.description: <u>Treasure Lost, Treasure Found</u> \qDid Theodore Gorse come this way? And if he did, can you and Bingo bring him to safety?\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Bingo's Burden
privateEncounter.description: <u>Bingo's Burden</u> \qThanks to his fear of horses, Bingo has decided that his journey in Rohan will take place on foot.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Through the Blockade
privateEncounter.description: <u>Through the Blockade</u> \qThe end of Bingo's journey approaches with every step, but rumours tell of a blockade that might slow his progress along the road.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Perfect Recipe
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Perfect Recipe</u> \qThe day of the party has finally arrived, and Bingo has sent you outside to greet the arriving guests!\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Mistaken Identity
privateEncounter.description: <u>Mistaken Identity</u> \qA frightful storm has descended upon the plains of Rohan, and it threatens to dampen Bingo's spirits!\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: What the Steward Saw
privateEncounter.description: <u>What the Steward Saw</u> \qThere is much to do, and now I hear the Steward has summoned my friend for an audience? Time-wasting rubbish!\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Darkest Hour
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Darkest Hour</u> \qFew in Middle-earth can defy the Witch-king of Angmar, but in this darkest hour, I will stand against him.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Too Far From the City
privateEncounter.description: <u>Too Far From the City</u> \qOsgiliath is lost, and its defenders flee across the plain. Can they reach the White City before the enemy overtakes them?\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: A Matter of Lineage
privateEncounter.description: <u>A Matter of Lineage</u> \qYour encounter with Gothmog fills me with a dread I cannot explain. I hope to learn why here in the Old Archives.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Banquet and the Breach
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Finder's Gathering</u> \qThe children's Gathering takes place in a back room of the Old Guesthouse. Gifts, brought by all, are piled high on the table for all to enjoy.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Sparring in Minas Tirith
privateEncounter.description: <u>Sparring in Minas Tirith</u> \qWith a battle looming, the soldiers of Minas Tirith stand restless in the Training Ground. Perhaps you can help them ease their nerves.\q

privateEncounter.name: Public Instance: The Cisterns
privateEncounter.description: Public Instance: The Cisterns

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Vile Tongues
privateEncounter.description: <u>Vile Tongues</u> \qWith the aid of Mithrandir and Gúldil, you have tracked the scroll-thief to the Old Archives. If he cannot be reached before unleashing the fell magicks bound to the scroll through the Enemy's sorcery, Minas Tirith may be undone from within.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Bustle in the Blue Theatre
privateEncounter.description: <u>Bustle in the Blue Theatre</u> \qAfter negotiating a performance in the legendary Blue Theatre, the Cloudyheads endeavour to finally take the stage.\q

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: The Silent Street
skirmishPrivateEncounter.category: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: <u>The Silent Street</u> \qIn his haste to save Faramir, Beregond has thrown open the Fen Hollen and makes for the House of the Stewards. In his wake, the enemies of Gondor descend on Rath Dínen, the Silent Street, all hoping to bring the rule of the Stewards to an end.\q

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: The Quays of the Harlond
skirmishPrivateEncounter.category: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: <u>The Quays of the Harlond</u> \qIn secrecy, Aragorn has made his way up the Anduin with an army of men ready to fight for Gondor. Now is the time to help lead Aragorn's forces to Pelennor and turn the tides of battle!\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Death Comes for All
privateEncounter.description: <u>Death Comes for All</u> \qThe Rohirrim have taken the field, and the armies of Mordor cannot stand against us!\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: A Final Vengeance
privateEncounter.description: <u>A Final Vengeance</u> \qWe have to find Golodir before it is too late!\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Ride of the Rohirrim
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Ride of the Rohirrim</u> \qSix thousand spears have come to Gondor at her darkest hour. It will become the hour of Théoden and of Rohan!\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: On a Field of Red
privateEncounter.description: <u>On a Field of Red</u> \qFight onward! The battle is not yet ended!\q

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Blood of the Black Serpent
skirmishPrivateEncounter.category: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: <u>Blood of the Black Serpent</u> \qAs the Battle of the Pelennor Fields intensifies, the forces of Rohan and Gondor unite to defeat the Men of Harad and their vile King: The Black Serpent.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Glade of the Three Merry-makers
privateEncounter.description: <u>Glade of the Three Merry-makers</u> \qRhûd-pulo-Drât, a wise Drúadan, leads you to a sacred grove of Púkel-men statues in order to ward away the mysterious beasts that invade the Drúadan Forest.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Lost Shadows
privateEncounter.description: <u>Lost Shadows</u> \qTracking down the Dheghûn has led you to an old mining chasm in Nardol Quarry. You should search the caverns for the source of these mysterious beasts.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Treating With Scoundrels
privateEncounter.description: <u>Treating With Scoundrels</u> \qDeliver the ransom and bring home my sons. Yet tread cautiously and keep your wits about you. We know not if these Variag men have any honour at all.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Foe Resurgent
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Foe Resurgent</u> \qThe Witch-king of Angmar is slain, but the forces of the Enemy remain unbroken. Instead of fleeing at the sight of their Master's fate, their resolve is strengthened as countless new foes pour forth from Osgiliath. What other commander could lead such an army against Gondor?\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Honour and Treachery
privateEncounter.description: <u>Honour and Treachery</u> \qYour journey to avenge Léofdag has led you to the Pelennor Fields, while Fastred, Reeve of the Sutcrofts, seeks the foe that once sought to deliver ruin upon his lands and family. With your paths now aligned, you must strike as one against the treachery of the Enemy. \q

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Throne of the Dread Terror
skirmishPrivateEncounter.category: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: <u>Throne of the Dread Terror</u> \qThe Enemy's grip tightens on the defenders of Gondor as Gothmog seizes control of the armies of Mordor. Marching from the gates of Osgiliath, foes pour into the Pelennor Fields with a renewed vigour. In the wake of the Witch-king's defeat, vile sorcery looms over the field as the most powerful allies of the Dread Terror are summoned forth. If Gothmog spoke true of the fate he shares with Golodir, can victory yet be found?\q

privateEncounter.name: Interlude: The Hands of a Healer
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Hands of a Healer</u> \qA great effort has been expended to find kingsfoil for the wounded, but now their survival depends upon Aragorn's healing skill.\q

privateEncounter.name: Interlude: A Dream of Cold and Silence
privateEncounter.description: <u>A Dream of Cold and Silence</u> \qWhat do you think is going on in there? Do you think Merry can recover?\q

privateEncounter.name: Interlude: A Secret Return
privateEncounter.description: <u>A Secret Return</u> \qIoreth says the hands of the king were the hands of a healer? I must find Aragorn and see if this be so!\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Ambush
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Ambush</u> \qOrcs and Easterlings have set a trap for the Host of the West, but now we seek to foil the ambush before it can be sprung.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: By Secret Steps
privateEncounter.description: <u>By Secret Steps</u> \qI will not lead the Host of the West into Dagorlad without knowing what awaits us. I have sent trustworthy friends to scout before us on the battle-plain.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Council of the Captains
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Council of the Captains</u> \qAragorn has called for a council to determine his next course of action. May wisdom guide his steps!\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Reclamation of Talath Anor
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Reclamation of Talath Anor</u> \qLearning of a group of Haradrim, unwilling to surrender, Elfhelm summons you to join him on a mission to rid Talath Anor of these fleeing foes.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Head of the Fallen Beast
privateEncounter.description: <u>Head of the Fallen Beast</u> \qIn an attempt to cleanse the Pelennor Fields, I have asked for you and Éomer to destroy the corpse of the Witch-king's fell-beast.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Mourning the Dead
privateEncounter.description: <u>Mourning the Dead</u> \qAfter much bloodshed and loss, I have asked everyone gathered at my Pavilion to rest and mourn the deaths of our brethren.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Fire Beneath the Shadow
privateEncounter.description: <u>Fire Beneath the Shadow</u> \qTo protect the Host of the West, I have taken it upon myself to lead Aragorn and his trusted friend into the Morgul Vale.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Retaking of Cair Andros
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Retaking of Cair Andros</u> \qThe Faint-hearted, that I have dismissed, now wish to quell their shame by retaking the island fortress of Cair Andros, for Gondor.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Travellers in Ithilien
privateEncounter.description: <u>Travellers in Ithilien</u> \qSuspicious of an unquenched fire in the distance, Faramir led Anborn and the Rangers to a campsite where they discovered neither Man nor Orc.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: A Troubling Path
privateEncounter.description: <u>A Troubling Path</u> \qAfter returning to Henneth Annûn, Faramir called for Anborn to escort the gangrel-creature to answer for coming to the Forbidden Pool without permission.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Riches of Rhûn
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Riches of Rhûn</u> \qBetrayed by the Khundolar, Jarl Gurthilm and his company now seek to punish their treacherous benefactor and seize the gold that was promised them.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Forbidden Pool
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Forbidden Pool</u> \qDown beneath Henneth Annûn, in the Forbidden Pool, Anborn spied the gangrel-creature at last and called upon his captain and the Halflings to decide its fate.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Halflings and Oliphaunts
privateEncounter.description: <u>Halflings and Oliphaunts</u> \qAs he and the other Rangers prepared a trap for the Men of Harad at Cirith Negen, Mablung found his discussion with the Halflings loudly interrupted.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Flight from Khazad-dûm
privateEncounter.description: <u>Flight from Khazad-dûm</u> \qWhat has happened in Khazad-dûm? Whatever has befallen, the Iron Garrison is in danger!\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: A True Friend of Durin's Folk
privateEncounter.description: <u>A True Friend of Durin's Folk</u> \qWho among us can deny the great deeds you have performed on behalf of Durin's Folk?\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Wizard and the King
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Wizard and the King</u> \qNight blankets the city, but we have climbed in darkness high above Minas Tirith. I know not Mithrandir's purpose.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: A True Friend of Gondor
privateEncounter.description: <u>A True Friend of Gondor</u> \qA new White Tree will grow in the Court of the Fountain. May Gondor prosper!\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The King and the Steward
privateEncounter.description: <u>The King and the Steward</u> \qThe gates of the city lie before us. It is time at last.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Judgements of the King
privateEncounter.description: <u>Judgements of the King</u> \qMany are the matters set before the throne on this day. May I rule justly, for the good of Gondor!\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The King Under the Mountain
privateEncounter.description: <u>The King Under the Mountain</u> \qAt last, Dómor has returned from Mordor with a valuable treasure! Finally some good tidings!\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Skoironk Caverns
privateEncounter.description: <u>Skoironk Caverns</u> \qWith the Rangers of Ithilien establishing a foothold in the Slag-hills, the Enemy have retaliated. The Rangers seek to push subterranian forces from the caverns of Skoironk, back into the depths and far from the Host of the West.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Skoironk Caverns
privateEncounter.description: <u>Skoironk Caverns</u> \qWith the Rangers of Ithilien establishing a foothold in the Slag-hills, the Enemy have retaliated. The Rangers seek to push subterranian forces from the caverns of Skoironk, back into the depths and far from the Host of the West.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Towers of Teeth
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Towers of Teeth</u> \qWith the Rangers of Ithilien establishing a foothold in the Slag-hills, the Enemy have retaliated. The Rangers seek to disrupt the forces within the Towers of the Teeth watching over the plain of Dagorlad for the Host of the West.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Towers of Teeth
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Towers of Teeth</u> \qWith the Rangers of Ithilien establishing a foothold in the Slag-hills, the Enemy have retaliated. The Rangers seek to disrupt the forces within the Towers of the Teeth watching over the plain of Dagorlad for the Host of the West.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Black Gate
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Black Gate</u> \qWe have come to the very doorstep of Mordor to challenge the Dark Lord Sauron. There can be no turning back now.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Mordor Triumphant
privateEncounter.description: <u>Mordor Triumphant</u> \qAnd so we come to it, at last. The battle surges all around us, and our last stand begins...\q

privateEncounter.name: Interlude: No Other Way
privateEncounter.description: <u>No Other Way</u> \qUp, up, up the stairs, gollum. Gollum. And then... the tunnel, yes... this way, good hobbitses... yes...\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: A Place for Hobbits
privateEncounter.description: <u>A Place for Hobbits</u> \qIt is known as Bâr Thorenion, or the hidden house, for it is nearly that. Hidden and much abandoned. Nothing some rolled up sleeves and a little honest labour cannot set right!\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Deeper In
privateEncounter.description: <u>Deeper In</u> \qWell we've got to go back in now, that's how I figure it. Pipeweed and suspicious fellows! Now I want answers even more than I thought I wanted treasure.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: A Meal in Cormallen
privateEncounter.description: <u>A Meal in Cormallen</u> \qIt is so good to be here with you, old friends. And doing something so Hobbit-like as sharing a proper meal.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: World Behind and Home Ahead
privateEncounter.description: <u>World Behind and Home Ahead</u> \qWould you look at this. All of us here again, gathered round! At least as many of us as there could be. What I mean to say is, it wouldn't be so, if not for our friend here.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Heirloom of the Wild Men
privateEncounter.description: <u>Heirloom of the Wild Men</u> \qYour efforts to cleanse the evils from the corrupted figurine have led you to a remote cave...\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Heirloom of the Riddermark
privateEncounter.description: <u>Heirloom of the Riddermark</u> \qYour efforts to cleanse the evils from the corrupted heirloom have run afoul of an Orc raiding party...\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Heirloom of Cardolan
privateEncounter.description: <u>Heirloom of Cardolan</u> \qYour efforts to cleanse the evils from the corrupted sceptre have led you to a remote barrow...\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Heirloom of the Eglain
privateEncounter.description: <u>Heirloom of the Eglain</u> \qYour efforts to cleanse the evils from the corrupted carving have led you to the Spring of the Red-maid...\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Heirloom of Rhudaur
privateEncounter.description: <u>Heirloom of Rhudaur</u> \qYour efforts to cleanse the evils from the corrupted cup have led you to a temple most foul...\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Heirloom of Khazad-dûm
privateEncounter.description: <u>Heirloom of Khazad-dûm</u> \qThe words of Galadriel before her Mirror surface in your memory...\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Heirloom of the Snowmen
privateEncounter.description: <u>Heirloom of the Snowmen</u> \qYour efforts to cleanse the evils from the corrupted brooch have led you to the settlement of Sûri-kylä, where something is wrong...\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Heirloom of the High King
privateEncounter.description: <u>Heirloom of the High King</u> \qYour efforts to cleanse the evils from the corrupted badge have led you to the Bridge of Ariant, high above Lake Evendim, in the City of Kings...\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Heirloom of the Tribes
privateEncounter.description: <u>Heirloom of the Tribes</u> \qYour efforts to cleanse the evils from the corrupted needle have led you to the oldest woman in Lhanuch, and the story she has to tell...\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Heirloom of the Earth-kin
privateEncounter.description: <u>Heirloom of the Earth-kin</u> \qYour efforts to cleanse the evils from the corrupted Earth-kin pouch have led you to an Ent, a shepherd of the trees, and the story he has to tell...\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Halflings and Oliphaunts
privateEncounter.description: <u>Halflings and Oliphaunts</u> \qAs he and the other Rangers prepared a trap for the Men of Harad at Cirith Negen, Mablung found his discussion with the Halflings loudly interrupted.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Memories of the Last Alliance
privateEncounter.description: <u>Memories of the Last Alliance</u> \qHoping to raise the spirits of the Host of the West, Elladan and Elrohir have offered to tell the tale of a great victory over the Enemy at the end of the Second Age.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Vengeance of the Fallen
privateEncounter.description: <u>Vengeance of the Fallen</u> \qIn a desperate bid to rid the Wastes of two terrible foes, Faramir, son of Ondoher, has devised a ruse to set the Wainriders of old against the merciless Black Númenórean, Burudagath the Bloodletter.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Union of Evil
privateEncounter.description: <u>Union of Evil</u> \qRemain alert. You go among our enemies, and will be in grave danger if you are discovered.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Fate of the Stonemaiden
privateEncounter.description: <u>Fate of the Stonemaiden</u> \qSee... hear... know...\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Cruel History of Durthang
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Cruel History of Durthang</u> \qMy tale begins more than a thousand years ago, when the watch on Mordor had already begun to fail...\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Song of Sweet Lara
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Song of Sweet Lara</u> \qThis is far enough for the night. We will continue to the city in the morning. Get a fire started!\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Mouth of Gondor
privateEncounter.description: <u>Mouth of Gondor</u> \qRemain on your guard, my friend. You speak with my voice, and should be free of harm, but this embassy will not be without danger...\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Eagles Are Coming!
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Eagles Are Coming!</u> \qGwaihir the Windlord and his noble subjects have come to the aid of the Host of the West!\q

privateEncounter.name: Interlude: The Precious, At Last
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Precious, At Last</u> \qGollum caught up to us on the slope of Mount Doom, and Sam stayed behind to deal with him while I entered the Mountain, eager to be rid of the Ring.\q

privateEncounter.name: Session: The Battle Under the Trees
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Battle Under the Tress</u> \qMy own kingdom was not the first attacked. First came Lothlorien. Three times the Golden Wood was tested by Dol-Guldur, I have learned, the first falling some days before the battle at high-walled Minas Tirith in Gondor.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: A Faltering Reflection
privateEncounter.description: <u>A Faltering Reflection</u> \qYou are here. I am so glad. Come stand by my Mirror once more. We shall see what we shall see in it, you and I.\q

privateEncounter.name: Session: Revelation In the Rift
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Return</u> \qWe have followed Glorfindel's trail to, of all places the Rift of Nûrz Ghâshu. We must hope he has found the prophecy of Gil-galad there that he sought, and that all else lies as still and undisturbed as we left it.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Into Darkness Falls A Star
privateEncounter.description: <u>Into Darkness Falls a Star</u> \qIn the Year 3434 of the Second Age, a great Alliance of Elves and Men assembled in defiance of the Dark Lord's will to conquer all the lands of Middle-earth. The High Elves, the blessed of Valinor who suffered the greatest wraths of Sauron and Morgoth the Enemy, now seek to ensure that his evil is forever banished from the world.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Bow is Drawn
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Bow is Drawn</u> \qWith nothing else to stall it, the deliberations of the Elves' Council of War may begin. Take the place you have truly earned among them.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Secrets of Seregost
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Secrets of Seregost</u> \qSeregost, the big scary castle in Agarnaith. Nobody knows what's inside! Secrets and probably shiny things. Viznak, the best and smartest Goblin ever, with the help of his big strong bodyguards, will try to get in there! Oh, also, we will try to find out stuff about this new plague. Yes.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Pit-fighter -- Day One
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Pit-fighter -- Day One</u> \qThe arena of Thorzhaf is home to a pit-fighting tournament, where the greatest warriors battle for fame and power.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Ithil-stone
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Ithil-Stone</u> \qUnder the command of Ingold, many in Gondor work to thwart the nefarious plans of Dulgabêth, the Black Word as he sifts through the ruins of Sauron's defeat.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Bones of Barad-dûr
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Bones of Barad-dûr</u> \qThe crumbled tower of Barad-dûr is still home to vast numbers devoted to their slain Dark Lord.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Road on The Burning Mountain
privateEncounter.description: <u>Road on The Burning Mountain</u> \qThe ruined road of Mount Doom sits high above the scorched plains of Gorgoroth and has been a safe path for many foul things.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Fushaum Resolution
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Fushaum Resolution</u> \qThe divided leaders of Fushaum Bal have called a meeting to put aside the bloodshed and find compromise over disputed land, resources, and riches.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Pit-fighter
privateEncounter.description: <u>Pit-fighter</u> \qThe arena of Thorzhaf is home to a pit-fighting tournament, where the greatest warriors battle for fame and power.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Escape From Naerband
privateEncounter.description: <u>Escape From Naerband</u> \qThraknûl, the chief torturer of Naerband, has locked his prison fortress down and looks to capture anyone disobeying his twisted laws.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Pit-fighter -- Day Two
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Pit-fighter -- Day Two</u> \qPit-fighters of Mordor have been known to rise to power through their efforts in the area of Thorzhaf.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Borangos The Horror
privateEncounter.description: <u>Borangos The Horror</u> \qNargroth, realm of Borangos, entrenched with otherworldly fires, houses more mysteries than the answers in which Isnír seeks.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Pit-fighter -- Day Three
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Pit-fighter -- Day Three</u> \qThe arena of Thorzhaf, home of a pit-fighting bloodsport, runs under the direct orders from Thraknûl, the Black Uruk.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: What Was Spoken and What Revealed
privateEncounter.description: For the forgeworkers who wish only to escape hard labour and the lash, there is but one hope. In this secret meeting with the Easterlings, they must somehow bargain safe passage far from cruel Mordor and vengeful Gondor and all they have ever known.

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Fatal Prize
privateEncounter.description: Captain Lachír's single fixation has taken him and his men deep into Anglach. But what is this miraculous metal he claims to have found there? Can good truly come out of the forges of darkness?

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Tower of Durthang
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Tower of Durthang</u> \qThe fortress of Durthang, headquarters of Ugrukhôr's army, is one of the greatest threats to those in Udûn, under the banner of Gondor.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Hold of Kála-murg
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Hold of Kála-murg</u> \qOne of the last hold outs of Orcs in Lhingris, the well fortified encampment of Kála-murg continues to be battered by Ungol forces.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Trouble at Bhol Rûdh
privateEncounter.description: <u>Trouble at Bhol Rûdh</u> \qHome to the Red Sky Clan, the village of Bhol Rûdh sits isolated, and with little defences, at the end of a long mountain path.\q

privateEncounter.name: Cirith Ungol
privateEncounter.description: Cirith Ungol

privateEncounter.name: LÃ»ghash, the Flaming Spire
privateEncounter.description: LÃ»ghash, the Flaming Spire

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Into the Abyss
privateEncounter.description: <u>Into the Abyss</u> \qWhat secrets lie in the depths of the Mordath? The little Dwarf-king and his people will soon know more than they dared imagine! Ah, but what is this? Another dwarf stands upon the threshold....\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: A House Forged Anew
privateEncounter.description: <u>A House Forged Anew</u> \qAfter seventy-eight years in the dungeons of Barad-dûr, King Váskmun Greytooth of the Stout-axes has returned to lead his folk. However, if there is to remain any hope of forging a new Dwarf-kingdom within Mordor, the Stout-axes must break free of their servitude and challenge the Mistress of Lûghash, Zôreth.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Choices of Master Samwise
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Choices of Master Samwise</u> \qWhere am I? Where have you gone, Sam? They've taken everything! Everything! The quest has failed!\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Necessary Sacrifices
privateEncounter.description: <u>Necessary Sacrifices</u> \qDesperate to be rid of the innumerable spiders and other foul creatures now feeding on the Orcs of Lhingris, Captain Róglarg of Cirith Ungol has gathered a company of Orcs to be sacrificed as tribute to Her Ladyship, Shelob.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Gnats in Her Net
privateEncounter.description: <u>Gnats in Her Net</u> \qAs the webs of Shelob's children rise over Cirith Ungol, tremors beneath the Ephel Dúath grow more terrible with each passing moment. What horrors now stir within the depths of the Tower?\q

privateEncounter.name: Anglach, the Great Foundry
privateEncounter.description: Anglach, the Great Foundry

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: The Dungeons of Naerband
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: <u>The Dungeons of Naerband</u> \qThe tightening grip of Gondor has compelled Urudanî, the Maiden of Flame, to seek a stronger alliance with Thraknûl, chief torturer of Naerband. Together, they have reforged the prison of Direhold into a place of flame, iron, and anguish.\q

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: The Abyss of Mordath
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: <u>The Abyss of Mordath</u> \qDetermined to wield the lost Ring of Power Manthríf once more, King Váskmun Greytooth has led his Firehorn dwarves into the Abyss of Mordath, where the sunken foundations of Barad-dûr now rest. Meanwhile, the Order of the Eye has made haste to pursue the Firehorns, eager to avenge their fallen and contest the dwarves' claim to the greatest artifacts of the Dark Lord. Unbeknownst to any of them, greater still are the terrors Sauron hid away in the shadows of the Mordath....\q

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: The Court of Seregost
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: <u>The Court of Seregost</u> \qDeep in the heart of Seregost, Lhaereth the Stained prepares to unleash a second Great Plague upon the realms of Men. Any hope of thwarting her lies on the intrepid few, led by rangers Rhadrog and Faeron, who have gained entry to her doorless keep.\q

privateEncounter.name: Public Instance: Harvest Festival
privateEncounter.description: Public Instance: Harvest Festival

privateEncounter.name: Instance: A Night for Ghost Stories
privateEncounter.description: <u>A Night for Ghost Stories</u> \qYou simply must celebrate the spirit of the scary season with us!\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Whispers from the Long Years
privateEncounter.description: <u>Whispers from the Long Years</u> \qI do not know what lies beyond that room of deep shadow. Remain alert!\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Dragon's Bones
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Dragon's Bones</u> \qFollow me, friend. Kólfith will not be long.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Wood, Lake, Mountain, and Stone
privateEncounter.description: <u>Wood, Mountain, Lake, and Stone</u> \qThis is Mazal Akrâz, the Chamber of Glory. My brother and my sons lie within. Let us go now to them.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Realm of the Old Mother
privateEncounter.description: <u>Realm of the Old Mother</u> \qThranduil Swiftstream, King of the Northern Wood, has finally found his old foe, the spider Iphantemel. Trapped within the rocky crevasse of Torech Emel, Thranduil hopes to keep sight on the spider until the Old Mother can be dealt with.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Scatha's Legacy
privateEncounter.description: <u>Scatha's Legacy</u> \qFróthi, a Lore-master familiar with both Scatha and The Weeping Warrior, looks to examine what remains of the dragon necklace.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Acolyte of The Necromancer
privateEncounter.description: <u>Acolyte of The Necromancer</u> \qOroniel, captain of guards of Felegoth, has unexpectingly encountered a threat from Dol Guldur, hidden within the old elven ruins of Caras Tilion.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Bregmor's Legacy
privateEncounter.description: <u>Bregmor's Legacy</u> \qFotri, a Dwarf in Forochel, has seen The Weeping Warrior and seeks to examine the corpse of dead Dragon, Bregmor.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Thorog's Legacy
privateEncounter.description: <u>Thorog's Legacy</u> \qSigrun, a Dwarf in the Misty Mountains, has seen The Weeping Warrior and seeks to examine the corpse of dead Dragon, Thorog.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Weeping Warrior
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Weeping Warrior</u> \qBryn, prince of Dale, has fled into the wilds. His mind still seeks out answers in these recent turbulent times that have befallen the Dale-lands.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Mysterious Thief
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Mysterious Thief</u> \qNight has fallen on the trading village of Loeglond. Now is the time to enact Sírithon's plan, patrolling the village in hopes of catching mysterious bandit.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Reach of Justice
privateEncounter.description: <u>An Incident in the Camps</u> \qYou'll see. Whatever unruly outbreak there was among the refugees, my sword-thegn Athálrik will have dealt with it before you got there.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Reach of Justice
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Reach of Justice</u> \qYou have found Athálrik. But I wonder, will he submit to the justice of this land? He seems to care for it only as a guise.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Deadly Dinner
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Deadly Dinner</u> \qA grand dinner is being hosted by the Elders of Lake-town, however the shadow of the late Master's murder still hangs over the Manor. Is something wicked about to unfold?\q

privateEncounter.name: Deep in the Darkening Wood
privateEncounter.description: <u>Deep in the Darkening Wood</u> \qDeep within Mirkwood, an ancient enemy has returned. A Beorning trader is lost within a maze of trees and thorns, predators closing in around him. Find a way through, and save him before it is too late.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Legacy of Durin's Folk
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Legacy of Durin's Folk</u> \qIt is a day of unity for Durin's Folk as we gather to celebrate our triumph over Sauron, welcome new allies from Mordor, and honour the return of old friends.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Bane of the Elvenking
privateEncounter.description: <u>Bane of the Elvenking</u> \qAt last, Iphantemel has been revealed by the receding darkness of Eryn Lasgalen, and now the remnants of her brood grow thinner with each passing day. For her gluttony and weakness, they have abandoned her to her fate, but now I fear they heed the call of one even greater: Ungwetári!\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Of Dreams and Desires
privateEncounter.description: <u>Of Dreams and Desires</u> \qIn days long past, I knew her as Tárasánë, the Green Lady, but the wickedness of the Necromancer and the great spiders of Ungoliant tainted the Greenwood and she was lost. What has become of her? Has she departed these lands evermore? Even now, I cannot say.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Scion of Winter
privateEncounter.description: <u>Scion of Winter</u> \qVethúg Wintermind - that is a name long-hated by the dwarves. He, the vile cold-drake whose frost once choked the halls of Thikil-gundu in the Grey Mountains, now comes to Erebor in vengeance. We have been granted little respite from battle, but we must stand against him or all shall be lost.\q

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Summer: The Perfect Picnic
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: <u>The Perfect Picnic</u> \qWhat a grand day for a picnic! Mayor Will Whitfoot has decided to join you for a delicious feast upon his favourite hill in all the Shire!\q

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Boss from the Vaults: Thrâng
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: <u>Boss from the Vaults: Thrâng</u> \qDeep within the Rift of Nûrz Ghâshu, Thrâng, the chieftain of the Ghâshfra, is ready to take on all comers who challenge his might.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Haunting of Wistmead
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Haunting of Wistmead</u> \qThese letters have gone undelivered for so long. Can it be they may hold the answers you seek?\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: None But One
privateEncounter.description: <u>None But One</u> \qOh, I do not like this spooky forest, not one bit! Let's see about this spectre and get out of here as quick as we can!\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: An Unexpected Summons
privateEncounter.description: <u>An Unexpected Summons</u> \qAs days pass with no sign of the cold-drake, Vethúg Wintermind, King Thorin III Stonehelm has grown impatient and seeks to learn the truth of these matters. Unknown to the King under the Mountain, an unexpected return may prove a boon to Durin's Folk.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Whispers in the Pits
privateEncounter.description: <u>Whispers in the Pits</u> \qAfter being granted a troubling vision by the Green Lady, you have travelled to Dol Guldur in search of Karazgar. What will you find in the shattered halls of Gostador?\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Grievances
privateEncounter.description: <u>Grievances</u> \qI will hear this complaint, but not at my throne. I will go among the people.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The First Promise
privateEncounter.description: <u>The First Promise</u> \qSkarháld is under attack! Karazgar seeks the fulfillment of his promise!\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Warrior Found
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Warrior Found</u> \qThis is near the location where Vútro encountered the Weeping Warrior. Where then has he gone?\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Hidden Chamber
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Hidden Chamber</u> \qForgive the mess, my friend! I had only been cleaning for a short time when I found… well, you will see!\q

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Caverns of Thrumfall
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: <u>Caverns of Thrumfall</u> \qDeep within the recesses of the Stormwall lie ancient passages and twisted tunnels, concealing the whereabouts of Etterfang Foulmaw and her restless horde. Only the dwarf Drengur has seen the venomous beast and lived to tell the tale.\q

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Glimmerdeep
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: <u>Glimmerdeep</u> \qAn Orkish faction now occupies much of Glimmerdeep, pillaging its wealth for who knows what master and standing in the path of the Zhélruka resettlement of their ancient lands.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Lord of Iron
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Lord of Iron</u> \qPower is a heavy burden. I, Náin the Slakeless, son of Dáin Ironfoot, Lord of the Iron Hills, feel the crushing weight of the decisions I must make, and the lives that hang in the balance. There is much to consider. Now, who is this that comes before me?\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Secret of Stormwall
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Secret of Stormwall</u> \qDeep within the ruined crafting halls of Stormwall lies a burning secret, slumbering in the shadows....\q

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: The Anvil of Winterstith
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: <u>The Anvil of Winterstith</u> \qThrice, in times gone by, the Anvil of Winterstith opened and I and my horde were unleashed upon the world. Now my great glacier is riven once again, so soon after I returned. Who could this be at my threshold? What little, foolhardy mortals would dare disturb my solitude? \q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Lone Dwarf
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Lone Dwarf</u> \qI have given those two long enough. If they failed, that is on them. The time has come to deal with the Jangovar menace. The axes of dwarves shall be upon them!\q

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Thikil-gundu
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: <u>Thikil-gundu</u> \qAfter the great cold-drake, Vethúg Wintermind, was defeated at Erebor, it was believed that Thikil-gundu would at last be reclaimed. Unbeknownst to the Longbeards and Zhélruka, Karazgar, the Weeping Warrior, has claimed the Steel Keep and subjugated the wills of the Orcs and dragon-kind dwelling within its frozen halls. What has become of Nori's expedition in that ancient dwarf keep?\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: A Venomous Strike
privateEncounter.description: <u>A Venomous Strike</u> \qThe deadly Ungoledain now occupy these dwarf ruins on the outskirts of Thornholt and have been a menace to its inhabitants. They need to be driven away from the area before they can sow more of their venomous chaos.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Storm on the Withered Heath
privateEncounter.description: <u>Instance: Storm on the Withered Heath</u> \qThe barren, burnt expanse of the Withered Heath is deceptive in appearing empty. After centuries untouched by dwarves, it is rich in resources, history, and peril.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Siege of Óinsbridge
privateEncounter.description: <u>Instance: Siege of Óinsbridge</u> \qWhen the Ungoledain were driven out of Kêr Bréin, many fled and hid in the woods near Óinsbridge. Now the lumber needed by the Zhélruka to rebuild is in grave danger of becoming entangled in the spider-clan's venemous webs.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Delving of Glimmerdeep
privateEncounter.description: <u>Instance: Delving of Glimmerdeep</u> \qThe Orkish claimants to Glimmerdeep have been thrown into disarray. Those who would seek to return the mines to order must first join the chaos and lay claim to the rich resources found there.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Reclamation of the Steel Keep
privateEncounter.description: <u>Instance: Reclamation of the Steel Keep</u> \qThe daring may choose to enter the Steel Keep in search of its ancient secrets. Yet they would do well to be wary. Although Karazgar has been driven from those halls, they remain far from safe to trespass.\q

privateEncounter.name: Utterby: Continue the Fight
privateEncounter.description: Utterby: Continue the Fight

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Scars of Battle
privateEncounter.description: <u>A Scar of Battle</u> \qThe Zhélruka revealed that Vethúg Wintermind carved a great cleft through the Grey Mountains as he fell wounded from battle. Now Dori and Company seek to prove that the great cold-drake who slew King Dáin I has truly met his doom.\q

privateEncounter.name: Challenge: The Howling Pit
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Howling Pit</u> \qDeep beneath Járnfast, in a place where the red stone once cracked, three doors were recently riven. Three doors and a seal of mithril, built to contain a rift of howling horrors, straining to get out.\q

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Yule: The Battle at Frostbluff
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: <u>The Battle at Frostbluff</u> \qA fierce cold has come down from the mountains threatening the games the children of Winterhome are playing in the fields!\q

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Boss from the Vaults: Storvâgûn
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: <u>Boss from the Vaults: Storvâgûn</u> \qHigh in the cliffs above Helegrod, the traitorous Storvâgûn has pledged the giants of the Misty Mountains to the service of Angmar in exchange for vast riches.\q

privateEncounter.name: Storied Tale: The Deeping Wall
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Deeping Wall</u> \qThe armies of Isengard have brought great ladders with which to scale the wall. Push them down, push them down!\q

privateEncounter.name: Storied Tale: Helm's Dike
privateEncounter.description: <u>Helm's Dike</u> \qThe rampart across Helm's Dike will be the first line of defence. But for how long will it hold?\q

privateEncounter.name: Storied Tale: The Deeping-coomb
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Deeping-coomb</u> \qThe fire of Orthanc has broken the wall! To arms, to arms! Defend the coomb!\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Hornburg
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Hornburg</u> \qThe Hornburg must not fall! This is the last defence, my friend. We must stand for as long as we can. For Rohan.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Glittering Caves
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Glittering Caves</u> \qThe folk sheltering in the caves will be defenceless if the battle goes against us. Protect them, my friend.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Blooms of Anarlossë
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Blooms of Anarlossë</u> \qListen to me now, and I will tell you of days long ago, when my brother and I walked among the flowers of yesteryear in the lands of Men....\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Revenge of the Great Goblin
privateEncounter.description: <u>Revenge of the Great Goblin</u> \qThe Great Goblin's forces are approaching and the Warlord's host lies in wait. Battle will soon erupt. All we can do now is watch and hope they fall upon each other's spears.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Great Goblin in Exile
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Great Goblin in Exile</u> \qA horde of goblins has departed Goblin-town, and wrought chaos in its path. We have followed, and come to their new hiding place. Now we have them cornered. It is time we found out what is going on here!\q

privateEncounter.name: Goblin-town: Shárnakh Reigns
privateEncounter.description: Goblin-town: Shárnakh Reigns

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Gift of Greenleaves
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Gift of Greenleaves</u> \qMy story begins not long ago, at the Elven ruins of Rhosgobel.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Defence at the Carrock
privateEncounter.description: <u>Defence at the Carrock</u> \qIn the morning mist, shadows came to the Carrock. As they singed the horizon, my only thought was to protect the sacred rock with my life.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: A Beorninghús Tradition
privateEncounter.description: <u>A Beorninghús Tradition</u> \qIt is a Beorning tradition to signal both ends and beginnings with a feast.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Heeding the Call
privateEncounter.description: <u>Heeding the Call</u> \qWe can not allow Rhosgobel to fall into the claws of the Ungoledain!\q

privateEncounter.name: Public Instance: Protecting Avabárg
privateEncounter.description: Public Instance: Protecting Avabárg

privateEncounter.name: Public Instance: Protecting Kidzul-kâlah
privateEncounter.description: Public Instance: Protecting Kidzul-kâlah

privateEncounter.name: Public Instance: Protecting Shathur-munzu
privateEncounter.description: Public Instance: Protecting Shathur-munzu

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Painting the Picture
privateEncounter.description: <u>Painting the Picture</u> \qAllow my words to paint a picture for you, my friend: a picture from long ago.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: A Promise Kept
privateEncounter.description: <u>A Promise Kept</u> \qThis must be Karazgar's doing! We have to hurry!\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: A Request
privateEncounter.description: <u>A Request</u> \qI just want to talk.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Shadow Hunter
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Shadow Hunter</u> \qThe time has come to enter the dwarf ruin, Shathur-munzu. The Woodmen warned us of 'monsters' and 'The Shadow Hunter', but I remain unconvinced. Whatever lies inside, we are capable of defeating it.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Dawn's Arrival
privateEncounter.description: <u>Dawn's Arrival</u> \qDespite all our efforts, evil still lingers in the world. It has crawled into the dark corners and deep places to hide from the light. I will not allow it to threaten one of our own. It will not hide from me anymore.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Snatcher
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Snatcher</u> \qÚbil the Snatcher.... My father, Beorn, told me of that creature in my youth. He thought it a gangrel-beast that crawled from some dark cleft in the night. For many years, it crept unseen into the villages of the Woodmen and stole away their children to sate its hunger, but when it could hide no longer the creature fled the Vales of Anduin... never to return.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Only Half-Remembered
privateEncounter.description: <u>Only Half-Remembered</u> \qI will bring you to my friend, but do not disturb his rest. My song keeps him at peace.\q

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Gath Daeroval, the Shadow-roost
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: <u>Gath Daeroval, the Shadow-roost</u> \qHigh above the Morgul Vale in a cleft in the side of Achathras, Gath Daeroval is home to the Shadow-roost of the fell beasts. It is said to be home to Khatlob, the massive, voracious brood-mother of the roost, who laid the eggs whence sprang the mounts of the Witch-king and the other Ringwraiths.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Foreword: Many Unhappy Returns
privateEncounter.description: <u>Foreword: Many Unhappy Returns</u> \qVery long ago, there lived by the banks of the Great River a clever-handed and quiet-footed little people. There was among them a family of high repute, ruled by a Grandmother, and the most inquisitive and curious-minded of that family was named Sméagol.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Sharkey's Night
privateEncounter.description: <u>Sharkey's Night</u> \qToo late I realized the treachery of Saruman. Far afield of Rhosgobel and the path of my errand, the reach of the White Hand spread to the Gladden Fields. There his servants sought the Ring he would not claim, and there they remain, forgotten in purpose... searching for naught.\q

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: The Depths of Kidzul-kâlah
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: <u>The Depths of Kidzul-Kalah</u> \qThe dwarves left deep scars in the earth, and in their absence terrible things have moved into the dark pits. The waters of the Gladden merely halted their spread. With your aid I might end this threat... for good.\q

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Eithel Gwaur, the Filth-well
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: <u>Eithel Gwaur, the Filth-well</u> \qAt the source of the Morgulduin lies the Eithel Gwaur. It is the prison of Rauniel, the River Maiden, who seeks her freedom as she beckons you ever further into this watery chamber.\q

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Gorthad Nûr, the Deep-barrow
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: <u>Gorthad Nûr, the Deep-barrow</u> \qShalgoth, the leader of the kergrim bone worshipers, hides far within Gorthad Nûr, the Deep-barrow. He and his followers seek to complete some dark ritual of necromancy, and must be stopped.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Sons of Isildur
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Sons of Isildur</u> \qThis siege has lasted much longer than anyone expected, or hoped.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Tales of the Bright Company
privateEncounter.description: <u>Tales of the Bright Company</u> \qGlorfindel and the Bright Company have accomplished many heroic feats in service of High King Gil-galad. But be not over-awed! I have found them friendly and approachable both.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: All Is Quiet
privateEncounter.description: <u>All Is Quiet</u> \qAll is quiet, and our victory will soon be at hand. And to think you doubted this would be easy!\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Picture Painted
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Picture Painted</u> \qListen now to my words, and the words of Vóin.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Glory of the Bright Company
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Glory of the Bright Company</u> \qWe came without incident to the tunnel of Halroth, and ventured within. Our greatest danger lay ahead.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Council of Kings
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Council of Kings</u> \qI have shown our trophies to the guard, and he at least will allow us inside.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: A Bad Birthday
privateEncounter.description: <u>A Bad Birthday</u> \qThis may be the last meal we take all together: before the end of the war, or our lives!\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: A Vengeful Heart
privateEncounter.description: <u>A Vengeful Heart</u> \qSomeone else has entered the tower! Be on guard!\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Gothmog's Rage
privateEncounter.description: <u>Gothmog's Rage</u> \qIf you do not follow my commands it will be your death, prisoner! Now move!\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Warrior Remade
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Warrior Remade</u> \qThis story begins during the reign of King Eärnil II, who was troubled by the loss of Minas Ithil to the forces of the Witch-king.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Sword and the Stonemaiden
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Sword and the Stonemaiden</u> \qThese are the Halls of Memory, where the words of Vóin give shape to deeds from long ago. Hold your questions, Faramir!\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Vóin's Tale
privateEncounter.description: <u>Vóin's Tale</u> \qWhat secrets did Vóin hide within these Halls of Memory? Let us now discover them, my friend.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Freed of the Burden
privateEncounter.description: <u>Freed of the Burden</u> \qWhat secrets did she add to the Halls of Memory? I wonder…\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Disaster
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Disaster</u> \qThe second attack was more fierce than the first had been. Isildur's defeat seemed certain.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: His Father's Son
privateEncounter.description: <u>His Father's Son</u> \qNever before had I known such despair.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Wanderer's Confession
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Wanderer's Confession</u> \qThis is my tale. Hear it, and know from whence I came.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Shadow of Mordor
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Shadow of Mordor</u> \qAs the Dark Lord's servants carry out the release of a mysterious prisoner, the Stout-axes rise in revolt, desperate to escape from the Dark Tower and flee to lands untouched by the shadow of Mordor.\q

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: The Fallen Kings
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: <u>The Fallen Kings</u> \qIt is said that the nine Nazgûl would assemble, in those days of battle, to best their greatest adversaries and to strike relentless fear into those who dared face them in combat.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Raiding Party
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Raiding Party</u> \qHuneric, Lord of the Thíuda, has noticed the Enemy forces gathering at Mokh Darga and wishes to halt their raid upon Adambel before it begins.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Into the Circle of Wrath
privateEncounter.description: <u>Into the Circle of Wrath</u> \qTo gain a foothold in Minas Morgul, we must capture the tower of the Gate-wardens' Keep in the Circle of Wrath.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Into the Circle of Sorrow
privateEncounter.description: <u>Into the Circle of Sorrow</u> \qTo further the conquest of Minas Morgul, we must capture the Tower of Treegarth within the Circle of Sorrow.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Keeper of the Dead
privateEncounter.description: <u>Keeper of the Dead</u> \qDolenthol, a Ranger of Ithilien, leads a small group of brave warriors to track down the mysterious Thargaun, who rules over the dead within the Circle of Sorrow.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Forgotten Lords
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Forgotten Lords</u> \qWithin the Dead City of Minas Morgul, a forgotten chamber of the Witch-king has opened. What lies within the Fiend-house of Roz Dagalur, none can say.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Into the Circle of Madness
privateEncounter.description: <u>Into the Circle of Madness</u> \qTo further the conquest of Minas Morgul, we must capture the Star-gazers' Spire in the Circle of Madness.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Into the Circle of Despair
privateEncounter.description: <u>Into the Circle of Despair</u> \qTo further the conquest of Minas Morgul, we must brave of the horrors of the Lofty Watch-fort in the Circle of Despair.\q

privateEncounter.name: Barad-dûr, T.A. 3017
privateEncounter.description: Barad-dûr, T.A. 3017

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Tremors Beneath Barad-dÃ»r
privateEncounter.description: <u>Tremors Beneath Barad-dûr</u> \qAwoken by tremors in the dungeons of Barad-dûr, you and the other restless Stout-axes of Mordor seize the opportunity to speak without fear of punishment by the Dark Lord's servants.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Ambush at Echad Taerdim
privateEncounter.description: <u>Ambush at Echad Taerdim</u> \qWe return now to Echad Taerdim, but something is amiss. There is a foul smell on the air… the smell of death.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Viznak Lives
privateEncounter.description: <u>Viznak Lives</u> \qViznak has escaped the Halls of Black Lore with his life, but the merrevail are closing in! We must hurry, before Faeron is overrun!\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Nothing for Nothing
privateEncounter.description: <u>Nothing for Nothing</u> \qLhaereth the Stained has invaded the Circle of Madness seeking information. It has brought her to my doorstep, the Halls of Black Lore. She may perhaps gain what she seeks, but I have one rule that all who enter must observe: Nothing for nothing.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: She Who Walks in the Darkness
privateEncounter.description: <u>She Who Walks in the Darkness</u> \qHere agelong she has dwelt, an evil thing in spider-form. She who was here before Sauron, and before the first stone of Barad-dûr. Shelob the Great, last child of Ungoliant. Ungwetári. The time has come to face her once again.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Pale Herald
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Pale Herald</u> \qListen well! You must hear of Rûkhor the Pale Herald, and how he led my people astray!\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Red Sky Darkens
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Red Sky Darkens</u> \qMy story begins at the camp on the edge of Agarnaith. You know the one.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Closing the Book
privateEncounter.description: <u>Closing the Book</u> \qI leave the final disposition of the Black Book up to you, my friend.\q

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Ghashan-kútot, the Halls of Black Lore
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: <u>Ghashan-kútot, the Halls of Black Lore</u> \qLong ago, this was a great hall of Númenórean wisdom and learning. A shining beacon high in the Moon-lit City. Until it was set to the torch by the Witch-king, and from the ashes, an endless repository of sorceries and secrets; the blackest knowledge. Here, I continue my life's work.\q

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Remmorchant, the Net of Darkness
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: <u>Remmorchant, the Net of Darkness</u> \qFar beneath the Ephel Dúath, in the deepest caverns of Torech Ungol, lies the Remmorchant, the Net of Darkness. There, wreathed in webs of shadow only the Light of Eärendil might hope to penetrate, lies the lair of Ungwetári, last child of Ungoliant.\q

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: The Harrowing of Morgul
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: <u>The Harrowing of Morgul</u> \qIn an attempt to repel the forces of Ugrukhôr and the Rangers of Ithilien, Gothmog's forces have fortified the outermost ring of Minas Morgul. Believing the ire between Ugrukhôr and Gothmog might be turned to your advantage, Damrod has tasked you with igniting a war between the Orcs in Minas Morgul.\q

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Bâr Nírnaeth, the Houses of Lamentation
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: <u>Bâr Nírnaeth, the Houses of Lamentation</u> \qNone come unbidden to the Houses of Lamentation. And yet, here are the Living and the Deathless, uninvited and uninitiated. I have not forgotten the rites of old, Master, for Morloth shall soon drink of their blood. There is flesh to be flensed and there are minds to be broken... and all shall be left naked before the Lidless Eye.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Secret Shadow
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Secret Shadow</u> \qFor how long had this pass been concealed by the sorcery of the Nazgûl? Of this place, I have heard no tale from the Lord and Lady of Lorien nor from the Men of Gondor, but I dread what evils might lie hidden there, undisturbed by the fall of the Enemy.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Trial of Wrath
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Trial of Wrath</u> \qIn haste to destroy an artifact such as this, a trial must be overcome.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Trial of Madness
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Trial of Madness</u> \qIn haste to destroy an artifact such as this, a trial of madness must be overcome. A failure, and one shall indeed face a certain death.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: A Waxing Moon
privateEncounter.description: <u>A Waxing Moon</u> \qFor what reason did the servants of the Enemy seal this hall? It is untouched by evil and disturbed only by dust.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: A Secret Meeting
privateEncounter.description: <u>A Secret Meeting</u> \qSomething thought secret has been brought to light. Something thought dormant has awoken. The Longbeards may have need of a hero once more.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: A Secret Chamber
privateEncounter.description: <u>A Secret Chamber</u> \qAn ancient chamber, kept secret for thousands of years, has been discovered by our intrepid explorers. Perhaps it was kept secret for a reason.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Stones Returned
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Stones Returned</u> \qThe five stones beg to be returned to their rightful places. By your hand, he will be unleashed.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: A Secret Meeting
privateEncounter.description: <u>Speak the Words</u> \qThe Emissary awaits. It is time to speak the words.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Limlók Under Attack
privateEncounter.description: <u>Limlók Under Attack</u> \qI do not like that this raiding-party has not shown itself... no, I do not like it at all!\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: An Echo in the Mountains
privateEncounter.description: <u>An Echo in the Mountains</u> \qHe is there! But what is he doing?\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Untamed Wilds
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Untamed Wilds</u> \qThe Beorning Vaskorn insists that a stand must be taken here and now against the approaching raiding party of wargs entering the Floodfells.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Goblin in the Cabed Rhimdath
privateEncounter.description: Instance: Goblin in the Cabed Rhimdath

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Goblin in the Forest's Edge
privateEncounter.description: Instance: Goblin in the Forest's Edge

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Taming of the Mearas
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Taming of the Mearh</u> \qHot-headed and brash, Eorl witnessed his father’s death and vowed to avenge him.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Running Wild
privateEncounter.description: <u>Running Wild</u> \qFor the Beornings, there is a time to work, and there is a time to run wild.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Secrets of Sundergrót
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Secrets of Sundergrót</u> \qThe Dwarves, Rúzat, Agátur, and Náth have stumbled upon a secret meeting between Rákhrum, Goblin Overseer of Sundergrót, and Gúrbarash, The Gundabad Hill-troll Chief.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Fate of the North
privateEncounter.description: <u>Fate of the North</u> \qThe dwarves Rúzat, Agátur, and Náth take the pass from Misthallow to Ered Mithrin, unaware of what waits for them.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Goblin at Tithroz
privateEncounter.description: Instance: Goblin at Tithroz

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Goblin at Veithhól
privateEncounter.description: Instance: Goblin at Veithhól

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Goblin at Scraper's Clough
privateEncounter.description: Instance: Goblin at Scraper's Clough

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Askâd-mazal, the Chamber of Shadows
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: <u>Askâd-mazal, the Chamber of Shadows</u> \qLong ago, Durin the Deathless sealed away an evil being known as the Shadowed King. Driven by intense jealousy, he wears the face of the Father of the Longbeards and builds a kingdom deep beneath the earth; a twisted reflection of the dwarf hall above, a mockery of the grandness of Khazad-dûm. He must be defeated, or his demented visions may become reality.\q

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Instance: Mission Quest Test
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: <u>The Stones Returned</u> \qThe five stones beg to be returned to their rightful places. By your hand, he will be unleashed.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Wedding Banquet
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Wedding Banquet</u> \qLong into the night, the folk of the city made merry and celebrated the union of King Elessar and Queen Arwen.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: A Wedding at Midsummer
privateEncounter.description: <u>A Wedding at Midsummer</u> \qIt was on Midsummer's Day that folk from near lands and far came to the White City to witness the Great Wedding.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Ill-fated Feast
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Ill-fated Feast</u> \qFram's celebration of the death of Scatha caused great excitement through neighbouring lands. Lords and emissaries prepared themselves for the feasting and revels to come.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Scatha Awakens
privateEncounter.description: <u>Scatha Awakens</u> \qAs Scatha scorched Fasthálla with his fiery breath, Frumgar and Fram took up arms against the dreaded long-worm.\q

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: Secrets of the Frostdelf
