skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: Within the halls of Thikil-gundu, hidden riches await excavation from the darkest corners….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: Dourhands in the Deep
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: Dourhands have found the Glimmerdeep and seek to mine what they can from its depths….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: The Beast of Misthallow
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: A beast in Misthallow has been terrorizing those on the southern path from the Grey Mountains….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: The Branches of Corruption
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: The Taurogrim have taken over Óinsbridge as their corruption threatens all in the Grey Mountains….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: Halls of the Dead
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: Within the halls of Thikil-gundu, the corpses of dwarves of old roam the ancient keep….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: Trouble in the Armoury
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: Within the halls of Thikil-gundu, Orcs from Gundabad have taken hold of the old armoury….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: Reclaiming the Vale-watch
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: The watch post of Bizar-atrâd, in the Grey Mountains, has been taken over by Frost-bound Hobgoblins….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: The Roots of Decay
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: The Taurogrim have taken over Óinsbridge as their corruption spreads out past the Thornholt….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: The Matron of the Keep
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: The entrance to Thikil-gundu has been blockaded by a terrible frost drake and her spawn….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: The Hunting Grounds
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: Meats are needed to feed those in the war efforts….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: Aiding the Bridge Builders
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: An ambush could threathen the bridge builders, who work to repair to the Hadhodiant….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: Burrowers by the Hadhodiant
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: Pesky stone-claws have been seen recently, digging around the Hadhodiant….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: The Vale-watch Rescue
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: The watch post of Bizar-atrâd, in the Grey Mountains, has been ambushed by a horde of dragon-kind….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: Collapsing the Old Paths
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: Dourhands have found the Glimmerdeep and seek to mine what they can from its depths….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: Blockade on the High Pass
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: Upon the High Pass, the Frost-horde has blocked the mountain path….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: Halting the Dourhands
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: Dourhands have found the Glimmerdeep and seek to mine what they can from its depths….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: The Matron of the High Pass
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: Upon the High Pass, a terrible frost drake guards the mountain path….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: The Matron of the Hatchery
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: Deep in the Wyrmsgráf, a terrible fire drake protects the nests of the worms….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: The Den of Worms
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: Deep in the Wyrmsgráf, what remains of Scatha's brood makes their den....

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: The Worm Hatchery
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: Deep in the Wyrmsgráf, what remains of Scatha's brood makes their den....

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: Den of the Frost-bound
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: The fearsome hobgoblins have sworn themselves to the Frost-horde and gained terrible power in return….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: A Frosty Reception
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: Several scouts keeping watch on the hobgoblin's den failed to report back. They must be rescued before it is too late!

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: Magic of the Frost-bound
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: The fearsome hobgoblins have sworn themselves to the Frost-horde and gained terrible power in return….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: Archers at the Gate
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: The Orcs and Wargs have returned to Shathur-munzu, attempting to set up a new base south of the warfront….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: The Gate Captain
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: The Orcs and Wargs have returned to Shathur-munzu, attempting to set up a new base south of the warfront….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: The Chieftain's Pack
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: The Orcs and Wargs have returned to Shathur-munzu, attempting to set up a new base south of the warfront….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: Son of the Chieftain
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: The Orcs and Wargs have returned to Shathur-munzu, attempting to set up a new base south of the warfront….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: Ore Overflowing
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: The abandoned mines of Sundergrót still hold valuable ore and treasures, ripe for the taking. However, the goblin intruders stand in your way….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: Under Command of Trolls
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: The abandoned mines of Sundergrót still hold valuable ore and treasures, ripe for the taking. However, the goblin intruders stand in your way….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: The Goblins for Gorgar
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: The abandoned mines of Sundergrót still hold valuable ore and treasures, ripe for the taking. However, the goblin intruders stand in your way….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: The Riches of Sundergrót
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: The abandoned mines of Sundergrót still hold valuable ore and treasures, ripe for the taking. However, the goblin intruders stand in your way….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: The Great Goblin's Treasure
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: Goblin-town has long been a thorn in the side of the free peoples in Rhovanion. Once again, the goblin horde inside stirs….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: Watch-towers at the Goblin-gate
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: Goblin-town has long been a thorn in the side of the free peoples in Rhovanion. Once again, the goblin horde inside stirs….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: Emissary at the Goblin-gate
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: Goblin-town has long been a thorn in the side of the free peoples in Rhovanion. Once again, the goblin horde inside stirs….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: The Goblin-town Gauntlet
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: Goblin-town has long been a thorn in the side of the free peoples in Rhovanion. Once again, the goblin horde inside stirs….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: The Sacrificial Tower
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: Far from Angmar, the last stronghold of the Iron Crown keeps watch over Elderslade for the forces of Gundabad….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: The Watchers of Iron
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: Far from Angmar, the last stronghold of the Iron Crown keeps watch over Elderslade for the forces of Gundabad….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: The Three Wardens
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: Far from Angmar, the last stronghold of the Iron Crown keeps watch over Elderslade for the forces of Gundabad….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: The Taurogrim Alliance
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: The wood-trolls known as the Taurogrim still haunt much of Eryn Lasgalen. If Gorgar rouses them to battle, they will pose a great threat….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: Idols of Corruption
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: The wood-trolls known as the Taurogrim still haunt much of Eryn Lasgalen. Deep in Grazadh-gropor, they spread their corruption among the trees….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: The Assassination of Gorgar
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: Gorgar the Ruthless has been tracked to Goblin-town. Will you find and defeat him in time?

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: The Secret Supply Line
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: Deep in the Misty Mountains, the Orcs and goblins use a secret tunnel to move supplies between Goblin-town and Gundabad….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: The Marked Target
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: To end this war, Gorgar the Ruthless must be defeated. But first, he must be found….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: Loyalty of the Frost-bound
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: Deep in the Grey Mountains, the hobgoblins launch a plot to free their mistress….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: The Main Gates
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: The gates of Gundabad are heavily fortified. Only by approaching with stealth will you remain unseen….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: Attack on the Armoury
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: Dâr Brulku, a fort near Gundabad, holds the Orcs' main stockpile of weapons and armour….

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Death of Scatha
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Death of Scatha</u> \qA vision of Fram the Foremost and Karazgar, confronting the dreaded long-worm, Scatha, comes into view.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Perilous Pact
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Perilous Pact</u> \qA vision of Fram the Foremost, fighting a fierce mountain-drake, comes into view.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Fram's Folly
privateEncounter.description: <u>Fram's Folly</u> \qFram was taken aback by his own demeanour. He loathed his unwillingness to mend the rift between the dwarves and the Ai-thúda. When he understood the curse upon him, he made a plan and acted upon it.\q

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: The Heart of Kidzul-kâlah
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: Nestled in the foothills of the Misty Mountains, the dwarf-keep of Kidzul-kâlah lies half-sunken in the Gladdenmere. Deep in its newly-drained depths, the Dourhands seek to mine the veins of the Goldencleft....

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: A Chill on the Gladdenmere
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: Nestled in the foothills of the Misty Mountains, the dwarf-keep of Kidzul-kâlah lies half-sunken in the Gladdenmere. Meanwhile, a pack of worms has encroached on the old dwarf-keep….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: Relics of the Goldencleft
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: Nestled in the foothills of the Misty Mountains, the dwarf-keep of Kidzul-kâlah lies half-sunken in the Gladdenmere. With the eyes of the dwarves elsewhere, the Dourhands have come to steal priceless relics long ago left behind....

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: Invasion at the Redhorn Pass
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: Nestled in the foothills of the Misty Mountains, the dwarf-keep of Kidzul-kâlah lies half-sunken in the Gladdenmere. However, the Redhorn Pass lies open to friends and foes alike….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: The Throne of Tharrazhâr
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: A remnant of the lost Dwarf-kingdom of Grárik, Skarháld has long-endured both the harsh climes of Ered Mithrin and the wrath of dragon-kind. However, the Frost-horde knows well its weaknesses….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: Into the Crystal Tunnels
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: A remnant of the lost Dwarf-kingdom of Grárik, Skarháld has long-endured both the harsh climes of Ered Mithrin and the wrath of dragon-kind. Beneath the Keep of Tharrazhâr lie tunnels of most beautiful crystal, but that is not all that lurks within….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: The Last Embers of Nûrz Ghâshu
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: In the armoury of Ashmâr-zarakh, the Orcs of Gundabad make ready their weapons of war. Rumours speak of an Orc of Angmar drawn into Gorgar's service….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: An Agelong Theft
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: High in the tower of Bekâr-zarakh, the Orcs of Gundabad prepare for war. In their keeping are weapons of dwarf-make, stolen long ago in the sack of Gundabad….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: Assault on Ashmâr-zarakh
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: In the armoury of Ashmâr-zarakh, the Orcs of Gundabad make ready their weapons of war. Many ballistae peer from its battlements, keeping watch on the gates of Gundabad below….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: Engines of Flesh and Stone
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: In the armoury of Ashmâr-zarakh, the Orcs of Gundabad make ready their weapons of war. Little do the Trolls of Gundabad fear, for their own might is enough….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: Breaking Bekar-zarakh
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: High in the tower of Bekâr-zarakh, the Orcs of Gundabad prepare for war. Among them, Ushgoth the Mighty makes ready to enact his plans on the battlefield….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: A Taste for Battle
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: High in the tower of Bekâr-zarakh, the Orcs of Gundabad prepare for war. Stored there to feed the war effort, many Orkish provisions have been left poorly-guarded….

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Pilgrimage to Sundergrót
privateEncounter.description: <u>Pilgrimage to Sundergrót</u> \qLong ago, during the First Age, the Greymaul Rebellion came to an end among the rocky cliffs of High Sundergrót.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The War of Three Peaks
privateEncounter.description: <u>The War of the Three Peaks</u> \qForward! Forward! Gundabad will be ours!\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Lord of Gundabad
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Lord of Gundabad</u> \qI hear fighting just ahead! Let us press on!\q

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Amdân Dammul, the Bloody Threshold
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: <u>Amdân Dammul, the Bloody Threshold</u> \qThe final battle of the War of Three Peaks has begun. Prince Durin Stonehelmson of the Longbeards leads the Gabil'akkâ, a great host of united dwarves, to the very gates of Mount Gundabad. But Gorgar the Ruthless, son of Bolg, has one last surprise in store for those who would seek to usurp him....\q

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: Abandonded Supplies
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: Within the old ruins of Stramvárth lie abandoned supplies from various Orcs and Goblins who have camped there….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: An Assault of Frost
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: The fortress of Skarháld is under attack! The Frost-horde has launched an assault from parts unknown in Ered Mithrin in hopes to drive the dwarves away….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: The Bloody Ritual
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: Upon the ruins of Shakal-atrâd, in Elderslade, an Angmarim ritual has taken place, defiling the old watch-tower….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: Raiders From Gundabad
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: A raiding party from Gundabad has been spotted approaching the fortress of Skarháld, in Ered Mithrin. No different than all other Gundabad raiding parties, this one seeks to slay all in their path….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: Training For Glory
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: Commander Rangvald trains dwarves for battle at the fortress of Skarháld, in Ered Mithrin….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: Beasts From the Hills
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: A vicious group of wild hill-beasts have descended upon the path to the mine of Glimmerdeep, in Ered Mithrin….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: The Missing Treasure
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: Treasures have been stolen from the dwarves! It is suspected that the treasures were brought to Shakal-atrâd, in Elderslade, and hidden in the depths of the old watch-tower….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: The Bloody Ruins
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: Within the ruins of Shakal-atrâd, in Elderslade, an Angmarim ritual has taken place, defiling the depths of the old watch-tower….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: Blockade at Glimmerdeep
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: Upon the entrance to the mine of Glimmerdeep, in Ered Mithrin, trolls from Gundabad have set up a blockade….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: Goblins at Stramvárth
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: A group of goblin raiders camp within the old ruins of Stramvárth for the night….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: Scatha's Legacy
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: Deep within Wyrmsgráf, there lies a great larder which once belonged to Scatha the Worm. Long lost to the Dwarves of the North, the time has come to reclaim the remains of their ancestors from Scatha.

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: A Glutton in the Larder
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: Deep within Wyrmsgráf, there lies a great larder which once belonged to Scatha the Worm. Rumours have spread of a gluttonous rock-worm dwelling among the bones of Scatha's long-devoured prey.

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: Well-fed in Wyrmsgráf
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: Deep within Wyrmsgráf, there lies a great larder which once belonged to Scatha the Worm. In recent years, it has come to be a feeding ground for the young dragon-kind of Ered Mithrin.

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Heirloom of the Eglain
privateEncounter.description: <u>Heirloom of the Eglain</u> \qYour efforts to cleanse the evils from the corrupted carving have led you to the Spring of the Red-maid...\q

privateEncounter.name: TBD Instance: A Champion's Courage
privateEncounter.description: <u>TBD A Champion's Courage</u> \qMosal-ruk, leader of the Orcs of Ost Cyrn, gathers his strength to crush the Eglain of the Lone-lands and press westward to Bree-land. Slade Ransford, a champion of the common good, stands ready with his allies to turn back the Orkish war-band....\q

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: Hunting the Hunters
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: Within Valdhellir, the most vicious Wargs of Elderslade dwell in darkness. There, even the most skilled of hunters must tread with care lest they become the hunted.

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: Jaws of the Dead
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: Within Valdhellir, the most vicious Wargs of Elderslade dwell in darkness surrounded by countless skulls and other grisly trophies.

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: The Shadow of Valdhellir
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: Within Valdhellir, the most vicious Wargs of Elderslade dwell in darkness. Drauglok, the leader of this terrible pack, poses a great threat to the Dwarves of Durin's Folk.

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Corruption's Cost
privateEncounter.description: <u>Corruption's Cost</u> \qThe Angmarim sorceress Brágha Fellwinder has discovered a way to enhance the power, ferocity, and madness of the deadly Warg. She must be stopped before she is able to pass on this knowledge or expand her capabilities.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Mysteries to Unravel
privateEncounter.description: <u>Mysteries To Unravel</u> \qFor reasons unknown, Aighrig of the Trév Dúvardain has ventured alone into the Angmarim encampment of Dûn Traikh. With the Angmarim bent upon hunting her down, the situation has grown dire.\q

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: A New Clutch
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: Although it once served as a camp of the Ungoledain, Kêr Bréin has fallen to the Frost-horde. There, the cold-drakes of Ered Mithrin lay their eggs within its ruined walls.

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: The Snows of Kêr Bréin
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: Although it once served as a camp of the Ungoledain, Kêr Bréin has fallen to the Frost-horde. From within its ruined walls, a powerful hobgoblin leads the raids on Skarháld and keeps watch on the newly-laid eggs of the Frost-horde.

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: Eyes on Elderslade
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: Rising into the Grey Mountains above the Greylin, Grálinvarth overlooks Elderslade and might prove a valuable foothold in the War of Three Peaks.

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: Wings Over Grálinvarth
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: Rising into the Grey Mountains above the Greylin, Grálinvarth overlooks Elderslade. However, a recent ambush by dragon-kind of the Frost-horde threatens the dwarves keeping watch from this valuable foothold.

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: Gorgar's Rebuke
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: Rising into the Grey Mountains above the Greylin, Grálinvarth overlooks Elderslade. After a bloody battle, Gorgar's forces have overrun the foothold and gained a significant foothold deep within the territory of the dwarves.

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Shakalush, the Stair Battle
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: <u>Shakalush, the Stair Battle</u> \qIt is on the stairs of Bagûd-mekhem, the Gate of Winds, that a decisive battle of the War of Three Peaks is to be fought. There, caught between those loyal to Gorgar the Ruthless and Hrímil Frost-heart, the Gabil'akkâ hope to deal a devastating blow to both of these forces in a single stroke.\q

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: Wall of Ice
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: Within the ruins of Stormwall, cold-worms have begun building icy walls within the vacant lair of Etterfang….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: Uncovered Treasures
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: Within the ruins of Stormwall, the vacant lair of Etterfang remains vastly unexplored….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: Two Heads are Deadlier
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: Upon the dwarf-ruins of Zarkul-sulûn, a deadly two-headed troll waits for those foolish enough to challenge their claim….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: The Fluttering Fires
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: Upon the dwarf-ruins of Zarkul-sulûn, bats have descended onto the Torrent-spires in the darkness of the night….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: Reclaiming the Torrent-spires
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: Upon the dwarf-ruins of Zarkul-sulûn, a band of trolls has claimed the Torrent-spires….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: Nests of Ice
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: Within the ruins of Stormwall, cold-worms have begun nesting in the vacant lair of Etterfang….

skirmishPrivateEncounter.name: Mission: Area of Interest
skirmishPrivateEncounter.description: Within the ruins of Stormwall, the vacant lair of Etterfang remains vastly unexplored….

privateEncounter.name: Instance: The Want-kin
privateEncounter.description: <u>The Want-kin</u> \qBearing no banners of allegiance, a curious company of dwarves has made camp in Elderslade. Whether they prove to be friends or foes remains to be seen....\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: Undermining UshkÃºtoz
privateEncounter.description: <u>Undermining Ushkútoz</u> \qDesperate to break a bloody stalemate in the War of Three Peaks, Agnar has devised a plan to infiltrate Ushkútoz and impair the defences of the forces of Gundabad.\q

privateEncounter.name: Instance: A Crack in the Iron Crown
privateEncounter.description: <u>A Crack in the Iron Crown</u> \qAs the Gabil'akkâ presses onward to Gundabad, word has spread that a mysterious enemy has arrived at Caivád Sâr, threatening to turn the tide of the War of Three Peaks.\q
